name: Rounding to the nearest integer. Math.round()

0.name: What does the Math.round() method return?
If the fractional part of the number is greater than or equal to 0.5, the argument will be rounded to the nearest larger integer

1.name: If the fractional part of the number is greater than or equal to 0.5, the argument will be rounded to the nearest integer

2.name: If the fractional part of the number is less than 0.5, the argument will be rounded to the nearest whole number.

3.name: If the fractional part of the number is less than 0.5, the argument will be rounded to the nearest larger integer.
